data.title: I've gone back 3 times
data.text:
Went out for lunch with my brother who was visiting Miami. The service was great. I love Veal Parm. There wasn't any on the menu, so I asked the lady who by now I knew was the owner if they could make it.
They could, they did, and it was great, as was the pasta, garlic cheese bread and the Italian Beer. Yes, I've taken others there since.

data.title: Unique and Tasteful Local Pizzeria
data.text: We love this neighborhood pizza spot. The ambiance and food are amazing. Dana, the owner, and her staff are always so welcoming. My kids love her and the place. Our favorite pizzas are the Vegetarian and Tanguito. They are delicious and boasting with flavor. We recently tried the Spinach and Gorgonzola white pizza and it was delicious as well. My husband and I also love the Tomato & Basil soup and the homemade Tiramisu. Our kids love the complimentary order of bread with olive spread. On Wednesdays, you can enjoy a bottle of wine for half-off. The house wine is excellent! I highly recommend this local and mom and pop pizzeria!

data.title: Wonderful Experience
data.text:
Cute find in North Miami's updated 125 Street. Quaint, nicely decorated retro & modern decor Italian Pizzeria & Restaurant. Sweet & trained service by attentive owner, taking pride in her establishment. 

You can savor the fresh ingredients in the plates ordered. Group enjoyed  crispy, thin white pizza with Kalamata Olives. Other in our table ordered Eggplant Parmesan Pasta, which was wonderfully tender. Salads were very fresh. 

Finished off with Cappuccino, accompanied by a complimentary Biscotti.  

We definitely plan on returning. Enjoy.

data.title: I LOVE THIS PLACE !
data.text: Best pizza and best customer service with great prices. I suggest that you head over to Yelp because there are far more reviews there.

data.title: A Special Food Shop
data.text: We had a great lunch at Tomato and Basil.  A fresh cheese shop and lunch spot, they feature homemade ricotta and mozzarella cheese and baked goods.  Lots of small dishes like Italian Spinach Pie.  Delicious!!  The Buratta Cheese was the best.  Be ready to take home their cheese for your refrigerator.  Very Casual.

data.title: great lunch spot
data.text: The pizza was fresh and hot. It is thin and crispy and cut into squares.  I am lucky that we work so close -great fast lunch! Welcome to the neighborhood.

data.title: Delicious
data.text: So happy this shop opened in North Miami. Very cool concept to upgrade offering in north Miami. Nice people. Fugazzeta is unbelievable.
